reviewText:
This DVD was of particular interest to me in part because it did not attempt to gloss over the *fatigue factor* as the younger students did combinations over an extended period of time. Often this aspect is not verbally addressed ,here it is shown, as well as mentioned. It clearly shows how girls and boys are trained to develop different muscles and learn different steps. The age range of children *tots to teens* was lovely; showing the youngest students learning simple steps progressing into teens years manifesting the end product of the lessons, with Grace,Skill and Endurance
Katherine Rosengren ( a great asset for teachers of young children)
